Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 124th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Benjamin Martinez (BOS)...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/12/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $6,251,100 per year...
Injured on 4/30/2018 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Montreal to Houston on 5/26/2018 (Going to HOU: P Dwayne Brewington, 3B Joaquin Depaz. Going to MON: P Daniel Thomas, P Beau Bodine, CF Robert Hubbert, 3B Timothy Myers)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York on 8/10/2018...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/17/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $7,650,000 per year...
Injured on 7/21/2020 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Montreal on 2/1/2021 (Going to MON: 3B Joaquin Depaz. Going to STL: P Felix Alvarez)...
Injured on 5/22/2021 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/23/2021 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
